name: Vitamin D
description:
You only have so much time to spend on different things.

But where will you spend it?

Go outside to fill up your Vitamin D which influences your mood.

Stay inside to be productive, make money and be successful.

This game was made using Quil for the Spring 2016 Lisp Game Jam.

You need to have Java installed. Double click the .jar file or run java -jar $jarname from your terminal.

The source code of this game is available under the MIT license. You can find the code on GitHub.
